## Installation

You can install the released version of ncvoter from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("ncvoter")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("nctriadresearch/ncvoter")
```


Please note that the 'ncvoter' project is released with a

By contributing to this project, you agree to abide by its terms.
